meanings.sent1: Her discomfitures were evident from the blush on her cheeks.
meanings.sent2: The series of discomfitures at the party made her want to leave early.
meanings.sent3: His discomfitures at the talent show were quite amusing to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The discomfitures of the awkward situation hung in the air like a heavy cloud.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her discomfitures haunted her for days.

meanings.definition: Events or situations that cause embarrassment or frustration.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected discomfitures during the presentation threw him off balance.
meanings.sent2: Dealing with discomfitures is a part of life that everyone experiences.
meanings.sent3: The discomfitures of the failed surprise party were comically disastrous.
meanings.sent4: The discomfitures of the past year felt like a heavy weight on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The discomfitures of the situation were etched in his memory forever.
